title: Battle of the Bridge: Remembering the Rivalry
text:

(NEWS CENTER) -- 
For the first time in decades, the Maine high school football regular season will come to a close without the Biddeford Tigers taking on the Thornton Academy Trojans in the Battle of the Bridge. But the memories of battles gone by still linger in the minds of those who loved the tradition, and respected what the rivalry meant to the two neighboring towns.
